official_title: Testing a Nurse-Led Evidence-Based Exercise Program to Improve Patient-Reported Outcomes in Adults With Acute Leukemia
inclusion_criteria:
* >18 years
* Diagnosed with either acute leukemia
* Receiving either maintenance or consolidation chemotherapy
* Able to walk independently for 4 meters with or without gait aid.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
